name: Tower Knight
description:
Can you reach top of the tower?

Legends says that the Tower Knight is still trying to this day.

The game is simple, you have two type of resources, Attack and Defens, with these you can use various abilities you find while ascending the tower.

To find success, try to plan ahead your attacks and defenses since you can see one level above.

Goodluck!

Would love your feedback, bad or good, give it to me!

I created the game using Unity, with only the default squares, circles and triangles :)

You can follow me https://twitter.com/appoxgames if you are interested in my work.
